text: Mission () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuri Yegorov.Названы время и место отпевания и похорон актера Геннадия ФроловаКОМАНДИРОВКА (1961) It stars Oleg Efremov, Dodo Abashidze, and Svetlana Karpinskaya. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuri Yegorov
title: Mission (movie)
